verses.verse: Blessed <WH835> are those whose ways <WH1870> are blameless, <WH8549> who walk <WH1980> according to Yahweh <WH3068>'s law. <WH8451>
Blessed <WH835> are those who keep <WH5341> his statutes, <WH5713> who seek <WH1875> him with their whole heart. <WH3820>
Yes, <WH6466> they do nothing wrong. <WH5766> They walk <WH1980> in his ways. <WH1870>
You have commanded <WH6680> your precepts, <WH6490> that we should fully <WH3966> obey them. <WH8104>
Oh that <WH305> my ways <WH1870> were steadfast <WH3559> to obey <WH8104> your statutes! <WH2706>
Then I wouldn't <WH954> be disappointed, when I consider <WH5027> all of your commandments. <WH4687>
I will give thanks <WH3034> to you with uprightness <WH3476> of heart, <WH3824> when I learn <WH3925> your righteous <WH6664> judgments. <WH4941>
I will observe <WH8104> your statutes. <WH2706> Don't <WH3966> utterly forsake me. <WH5800> BET
How can a young man <WH5288> keep his way <WH734> pure? <WH2135> By living <WH8104> according to your word. <WH1697>
With my whole heart, <WH3820> I have sought <WH1875> you. <WH7686> Don't let me wander from your commandments. <WH4687>

With my lips, <WH8193> I have declared <WH5608> all the ordinances <WH4941> of your mouth. <WH6310>

I will meditate <WH7878> on your precepts, <WH6490> and consider <WH5027> your ways. <WH734>
I will delight <WH8173> myself in your statutes. <WH2708> I will not forget <WH7911> your word. <WH1697> GIMEL

Open <WH1540> my eyes, <WH5869> that I may see <WH5027> wondrous things <WH6381> out of your law. <WH8451>

Let me understand <WH995> the teaching <WH1870> of your precepts! <WH6490> Then I will meditate <WH7878> on your wondrous works. <WH6381>
My soul <WH5315> is weary <WH1811> with sorrow: <WH8424> strengthen <WH6965> me according to your word. <WH1697>
Keep <WH5493> me from the way <WH1870> of deceit. <WH8267> Grant me your law <WH8451> graciously! <WH2603>
